channel.title: Double Barrel Handgun?
channel.description:
[img]http://blstb.msn.com/i/75/1BE1785D1934C9F10DD2EB43D9DC6.jpg[/img]
How convenient! Someone has finally invented a weapon that combines the killing power of a double-barreled shotgun with the portability of a handgun. After a decade of development, Arsenal Firearms is turning out a double-barreled .45 caliber, semi-automatic handgun that allows you to shoot two bullets at the same time, Gizmodo reports. The new gun, which can be ordered with one trigger or two, can hit a target the size of an orange 15 yards away and has the power to knock down a bull. As the James Bond-style villain breathlessly says in the over-the-top demo video, "That's performance."
http://now.msn.com/now/0312-double-barreled-handgun.aspx?ocid=todnow11 [hr] Seems like a very useful thing to me.

item.title: Double Barrel Handgun?
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Also I laughed when they said it took them 10 years to develop this, when it’s obvious all they did was weld together two 1911’s. What a gimmick!

Ah so I wasn’t the only one who noticed this.

Doesn’t smell like a scam at all in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Double Barrel Handgun?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Moparisthebest:

“The killing power of a double barrel shotgun”? Whoever wrote this article is obviously an idiot. Because the power comes from the large shotgun shell (and the type of projectile, generally buckshot), and double barrel shotguns also don’t shoot both barrels off at the same time. Also I laughed when they said it took them 10 years to develop this, when it’s obvious all they did was weld together two 1911’s. What a gimmick!

The source is MSN news, so you have to filter out the sensationalist crap.

Assuming the gun is fired from a close range, there isn’t really a point in two barrels firing simultaneous right? I doubt the extra stopping power justifies the lower accuracy and handling.

Read full topic

item.title: Double Barrel Handgun?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Useful for what, murdering people who step on your private property?
I’m not criticizing your right to defend yourself (This time), but when you praise a gun just because it is more effective of killing someone, I must say there is something wrong with your moral view.

Spend 10 years with fixing that problem that causes crime, and not by creating a gimmick as MITB explained.

Read full topic
